document.full_text: in a community center in the british midlands, 12 teenage boys -- all of south asian descent -- watch intently as jahan mahmood unzips a canvas bag and pulls out the dark, angular shape of a world war two machine gun.
document.title: special report: beyond bin laden, britain's fight against jihad
lines_and_colors: in a community center in the british midlands, 12 teenage boys -- all of south asian descent -- watch intently as jahan mahmood unzips a canvas bag and pulls out the dark, angular shape of a world war two machine gun.
